name: Archive
description: Allows users to hide their photos, videos and documents without deleting them.

name: Audio Call
description: Allow users to communicate with each other via audio call.

name: Audio Library
description: Allow users to maintain a library of audio files.

name: Audio Playback
description: Support for the playback of audio files.

name: Audio Slideshow
description: A feature to present a series of pictures, presented one at a time, with accompanying audio.

name: Audio and Video Messaging
description: Allow users to send audio and video messages to each other on chat.

name: Bookmark
description: A feature to allow users to bookmark links, articles, images on your platform.

name: Conference Call
description: Allow users to have a video or audio call with several people at the same time.

name: Playlist
description: Allow users playlist and maintain a library.

name: Video Call
description: Allow users to communicate with each other via video call.
